channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- scripts-organizer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- scripts-organizer

item.title: CVE-2021-24890|2024-08-03T19:49:14.364Z -- unknown -- scripts-organizer
item.description: The Scripts Organizer WordPress plugin before 3.0 does not have capability and CSRF checks in the saveScript AJAX action, available to both unauthenticated and authenticated users, and does not validate user input in any way, which could allow unauthenticated users to put arbitrary PHP code in a file
